data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Stack,
        TextInput,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Stack
    orientation="horizontal"
    alignment_y="top"
    spacing="medium"
    variation="wrap"
>
    <TextInput
        characters="20"
        value="This is a DEFAULT TextInput"
    />

    <TextInput
        sizing="tiny"
        characters="20"
        value="This is a TINY TextInput"
    />

    <TextInput
        sizing="small"
        characters="20"
        value="This is a SMALL TextInput"
    />

    <TextInput
        sizing="medium"
        characters="20"
        value="This is a MEDIUM TextInput"
    />

    <TextInput
        sizing="large"
        characters="20"
        value="This is a LARGE TextInput"
    />

    <TextInput
        sizing="huge"
        characters="20"
        value="This is a HUGE TextInput"
    />
</Stack>
data.title: TextInput Sizing
